text: They're the A - list couple who are certainly not shy about sharing their affection for one another in public. And Nicole Kidman paid tribute to her husband Keith Urban on Tuesday to celebrate the couple's 12th wedding anniversary. The 51 - year - old shared a montage of their 2006 Sydney nuptials to Instagram and gushed :'I'm a lucky woman.'' I'm a lucky woman': Nicole Kidman shares footage from her wedding day with Keith Urban as couple celebrate their 12th anniversary The clip shows Nicole in her Balenciaga bridal gown and veil looking into the eyes of her groom before leaning in to lock lips with the country music star.
